Dependencies

Make sure you have GIT, node.js and MongoDB installed.

Download the source

Clone the 'stable' branch using GIT:

git clone https://github.com/HashBrownCMS/hashbrown-cms.git -b stable --single-branch --recursive -j8

Get the node.js dependencies

There are a couple dependencies to get before you can fire up HashBrown. Go into your installation directory and pull them from NPM:

cd ./hashbrown-cms
npm install

Run it

Run HashBrown and visit http://localhost:8080 to see it in action.

node hashbrown.js
